text: InstrumentChamp is a music game for real instruments, produced by Music Instrument Champ, for Mac OS X and Microsoft Windows. ==Gameplay== Once installed, it listens through the microphone how people play on for example the guitar (wireless). The better people play in sync, the better the score. People can connect a piano and/or drums and play with many people at the same time, either together making a band, or as a challenge against each other. ==Supported real instruments== * Guitar * Digital Piano * Digital Drums * Saxophone * Trumpet ==See also== * List of music software ==External links== * * == References == * http://www.mynewsdesk.com/uk/instrumentchamp * http://swedishstartupspace.com/2014/05/05/instrumentchamp-announces-launch- music-game-platform-new-equity-crowdfunding-campaign/ * https://www.fundedbyme.com/en/campaign/2536/instrumentchamp-1/ * http://www.hackneygazette.co.uk/news/entrepreneurs_from_oslo_and_hackney_get_together_for_alternative_christmas_light_switch_on_1_3102291 Category:2015 video games Category:Guitar video games Category:Music video games Category:Video games developed in Sweden Category:Windows games Category:Mac OS games
title: InstrumentChamp
